headline: Competitors weigh in on impending FedEx spinoff
summary: Old Dominion, Saia, XPO and ArcBest all fielded questions from analysts about how the move might affect their operations and the broader LTL market.

headline: Should You Consider Adding Old Dominion Freight Line (ODFL) to Your Portfolio?
summary: Conestoga Capital Advisors, an asset management company, released its fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. For the second consecutive year, U.S. equity indices ended the year with double-digit returns after generating modest returns in the fourth quarter of 2024. Conestoga’s investment plans were hindered by the enthusiasm for everything […]

headline: Old Dominion: Don't Be Too Intimidated With Valuation
summary: Old Dominion's efficient cost management and low borrowings enhance its resilience and adaptability to market volatility and recovery. See why ODFL stock is a Buy.
